description:
Application for Non Material Amendment to planning permission ref: P2021/1479/S73 dated 31.05.2022

Application for non-material amendment to  planning permission ref:P2021/1479/S73 dated 31/05/2022 (Amendment to approved plans to change internal layouts of units in Block H including a rationalisation of layout forms, improvements to kitchen areas and to improve their effectiveness. Changes to the existing duplex unit in block J and minor change to spandrels on block J and correct drawing errors
decision_conditions:
Condition 2 is proposed to be amended as follows (amendment in bold and underline type). 

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plan unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority
